title: Improper generating of access link at go.larksuite.com leads to access to other organizations/users' private data

profile.name: Lark Technologies
profile.about: Lark is an online, all-in-one collaborative platform offering calendar, document and chat functions that bring people together

summaries.content: Improper generating of a Lark access link could have led an attacker to potentially brute force access codes revealing other organizations/users' private data. We  have resolved this issue and thank @w2w for reporting this to our team.
